thread.title: Erin Heatherton and Jimmy Butler play Horse - Swim Daily
thread.title_full: Erin Heatherton and Jimmy Butler play Horse - Swim Daily - SI.com

title: Erin Heatherton and Jimmy Butler play Horse - Swim Daily
text:
Back in April, first-year Swimsuit model (and basketball junkie) Erin Heatherton shot a video for SwimDaily and confessed her love for all things Chicago Bulls. When we asked her to name her favorite player, there was no hesitation. She chose Jimmy Butler . As luck would have it, Jimmy is a bit of an Erin Heatherton fan so with the NBA season about to start, it only made sense to bring the two together for a game of Truth or Dare Horse.
Erin, who grew up in Skokie, Ill. and played varsity hoops at Niles North High, was more than up to the challenge. And while she may not have won the game, her jumper sure looked sweet.
Erin can't believe she missed a shot. Jimmy proved to be the life of the party with his Carlton Dance.
In the end, a good time was had by all and the two embraced for a post-match hug.
• NEW: Week 7 $2M fantasy league. First place wins $150K and top 90K teams win cash! Sponsored by FanDuel The NBA season is less than a week away, and if the Bulls win the title, we know which swimsuit model will be front and center at their victory parade! BONUS: See some of Erin's best moments from SI Swimsuit 2015!
